features: Oat is the first ingredient in this scalp-soothing, softening, farm-fresh inspired shampoo blend infused with rose water and chamomile making gentle cleansing easy for sensitive skin

Blended for sensitive scalps to achieve a gentle cleanse and soft bounce from root to tip, these farm-to-shower fresh blend of ingredients work together to help promote a healthy scalp environment while enhancing your hair's natural beauty
Sulfate free shampoo, free from dyes and parabens, making it safe for all hair types including color treated hair
We are inspired by nature; our oat is sourced from a small town mill where pride and quality go hand and hand and we do not test our products on animals

Aveeno is a trusted household brand established in 1945 and is best known for its line of skin soothing products, where oat's natural soothing properties are put to work in body, face and scalp applications
body.description: We believe that beautiful hair starts at the root. Soothe and gently cleanse your scalp while adding a soft bounce to your strands with this farm-to-shower inspired Rose Water and Chamomile Conditioner blend for sensitive skin. Oat as the first ingredient helps to promote a healthy scalp environment. Infused with rose water and chamomile, this blend was designed with the sensitive scalp in mind. The blend of ingredients works to produce a light, fresh fragrance. Free from sulfates, parabens and dyes, this product is safe for color-treated hair. We source our oats from a quiet mill located along the rolling hills of the Mississippi River Valley, in a small town where pride and quality go hand-in-hand. We love the way we feel when everything is in balance. That's why we start with oat as the first ingredient. Each blend helps to soothe your scalp and nourish your strands from root to tip. Discover blends made with simple ingredients, from simpler times.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Aveeno haircare The NEW Aveeno Haircare Collection, formulated with oat and infused with wholesome farm-fresh inspired ingredients help promote a healthy scalp while nourishing your strands from root-to-tip. Oat is at the core of the Aveeno brand heritage...and now, the new Aveeno Haircare Collection. Each new Aveeno shampoo and conditioner contains oat as the first ingredient, which is known for its soothing and moisturizing properties.

Aveeno Oat Milk Blend Aveeno Apple Cider Vinegar Blend Aveeno Fresh Greens Blend Aveeno Blackberry Quinoa Protein Blend Aveeno Rose Water & Chamomile Blend Aveeno Almond Oil Blend Main Benefit Daily Moisture & Light Nourishment Clarify & Added Shine Refresh & Thicken Color Protect & Strengthen Sensitive & Soft Deep Hydration Recommended for Normal hair Oily hair; Normal hair product build-up Normal hair Color-treated or heat-styled hair Sensitive scalp, fine or fragile hair Dry, frizzy, thick, curly hair Details Infused with almond milk, this range provides daily hydration and balanced moisture Clarifies scalp while adding high shine to dull hair Infused with cucumber, rosemary and peppermint, this range refreshes and thickens hair to add volume Preserves hair color, strengthens strands and helps protect against damage from heat styling Infused with rose water and chamomile for sensitive skin and soft cleansing Infused with avocado oil, this range provides deep nourishment while locking moisture into strands Line Features Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave-in-Milk, Overnight Oats Hair Mask Shampoo, Conditioner, In-Shower Rinse Shampoo, Conditioner, 2-in-1 Shampoo, Dry Shampoo Shampoo, Conditioner, Heat Shield Mist Shampoo, Conditioner, Dry Shampoo Shampoo, Conditioner, Hair Mask, Oil Mist

Aveeno Kefir Probiotic Blend Aveeno Cotton Lightweight Moisture Blend Main Benefit Scalp Restoring Lightweight Moisture Recommended For Normal Hair Fine hair Details Scalp restoring moisture helps balance scalps microbiome to help nourish hair and scalp Ultra lightweight moisture and cleansing; for fine hair without weighing it down. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for me
reviews.reviewText: I really like this dry shampoo best out of many I've tried .. it doesn't have a lot of smell honwhich is fine.. it's not perfume.. but it did absorb the oil in my hair well and made it look fresh.. also it doesn't have any irritants in it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my sensitive scalp
reviews.reviewText: I have bought MANY shampoo/conditioner sets looking for something for my sensitive scalp (doesn’t make it itch a lot) that also leaves my hair soft and healthy looking. This one is it!!! I’ve bought high-end products and clean products, etc, you name it and I’ve tried it. This one meets everything I’m looking for and smells lovely! I usually can’t use highly fragranced products but the ingredients in this are clean enough that it doesn’t bother my scalp at all and leaves my hair smelling good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I don't like it as much as I wanted, but it's not badPROs:-my head doesn't itch like it does with almost every other dry shampoo I have tried which is kind of a big deal because it claims to be gentle and actually is!-the white residue it leaves it minimal and is very easily brushed out.CONs:-my hair feels weird. Yes it feels like the product absorbs excess oil from my scalp and my hair does feel cleaner, but it doesn't actually look cleaner or refreshed. It still looks semi-greasy because it plasters the hair to my head even after brushing and attempted fluffing. It also makes my hair feel super texturized. Imagine if you put a bunch of hairspray on your head and left it overnight and then brushed it out the next morning. The hair isn't stiff or sticky but it definitely doesn't feel presentable. This would be fine if you were going to just use the product and then wear a messy bun/ponytail or were going to go workout, but using this and wearing my hair down does not work because it makes the hair difficult to manage-the smell. This could be hit or miss, honestly. It's not specifically fruity, floral, citrus, musky, or baby powdery. It reminds me of professional products in salons if anyone can understand that. It's certainly not a bad smell and there's no hint of an off-putting chemical smell. It's just different and unexpected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and I'm not allergic!
reviews.reviewText: I'm allergic to just about every hair care product there is. Shampoos, conditioners, hair gels and sprays, you name it. I used special eczema-safe shampoo and conditioner for years (sure, they're hypoallergenic, but otherwise they suck) and only recently found some that doesn't give me hives and/or severely itchy scalp (Pharmacopeia Citrus, for fellow sufferers - it's organic, vegan and not chock full of chemicals). Aveeno has been a great brand for me in the past, with excellent anti-itch eczema lotions and such... so I thought if anyone's going to make a dry shampoo that doesn't trigger my allergies, Aveeno's probably my best bet. Even so, I steeled myself for the distinct possibility that this was going to be just one more of the dozens and dozens of products I've bought, tried once, and had to give or throw away due to my allergies. But this stuff is fantastic! Does a wonderful job on my hair and makes it look great for those daily Zoom meetings at work. Smells really nice without being overpowering or allergenic to my nose and lungs. Absolutely no itching or rashes. Easy and quick - takes only a few seconds to use if I'm in a hurry. Hair has body and looks beautiful and natural. Couldn't be more pleased with this product! Thanks, Aveeno!EDIT: I'm now allergic to the Pharmacopeia Citrus as well. Such is my allergic life. So I tried the Aveeno Greens shampoo and conditioner and they were actually better for less money. My hair feels more moisturized, my wallet feels fatter... and look ma, no hives! Been using for several months now with zero problems. Shoulda tried Aveeno first, I guess. Ha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hair and Scalp Feel So Healthy!
reviews.reviewText: This might be my new favorite conditioner. My hair has never felt so healthy. The scent is wonderful, too. I always feel so refreshed after using this product. It is meant for dry and sensitive skin and hair, so it is perfect for those looking for something nice and gentle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This is supposed to be soothing, but I am allergic to it
reviews.reviewText: Since Aveeno stopped carrying there sulfate free seaweed line, I have been trying to find a new shampoo that doesn't make my sensitive skin turn red and burn. So far I'm still trying to find an Aveeno line that I can use, but this one isn't it. The smell is strong, for one thing, and I have the allergic skin reaction, as well as a stuffed up nose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After chemotherapy, I lost all my hair. When it grew back enough to wash, my old shampoo made my scalp itch. This shampoo has been amazing and my hair is always soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not only did it help with my itchy winter scalp it smells fantastic, will definitely buy again, highly recommended it.
La calidad es increíble, el aroma permanece mucho tiempo, no irrita los ojos, buen generador de espuma. Ideal para usarlo si tienes algún permanente en el cabello.
Muy buen shampoo. Lo usa mi mujer y comenta que tiene un aroma ejemplar. Le deja su cabello fácil de peinar con una muy buena fragancia.

reviews.reviewTitle: Me encantan los shampoos y enjuagues de Aveeno
reviews.reviewText: No tienen tintes, ni sulfatos ni parabenos por tanto ni irritan el cuero cabelludo ni dejan residuos.

Got two bottles of this shampoo for my sister and I. It was a disaster for both of us. Our hair became extremely weak and dry after two washes. The texture of our hair turned out to be very rough. There is a odd kind of smell in the shampoo which is very unpleasant. It smells like garbage mixed in a perfume. We threw the shampoo in the dustbin after getting our hair ruined. Negative rating for this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Smooth, rich and no rashes or raised lumps on my scalp ...
